name: The Evil Nun Simulacra Granny
description:
Welcome to the one of scariest horror game , challenge your weak and prove your bravery
You have 5 days to escape from this house or you gonna stay the rest of your life there

Move silently ,don't make noises , search for all useful objects to escape
avoid traps and don't forget to look around you because she is everywhere and anywhere

Good Luck !
